judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant to pay costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Andrew B. Cantor, with him Morris Gerber, Alan E. Boroff, and Wisler, Pearlstme, Talone & Gerber, for appellant.
Anthony S. Minisi, with him Gerald J. MeConomy, and Wolf, Bloch, Schorr and Solis-Cohen, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
DeMedio v. DeMedio, Appellant.
Argued January 8, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Andrew B. Cantor, with him Morris Gerber, Alan E. Boroff, and Wisler, Pearlstme, Talone & Gerber, for appellant.
Anthony S. Minisi, with him Gerald J. MeConomy, and Wolf, Bloch, Schorr and Solis-Cohen, for appellee.
March 20, 1970:
